message: "It could happen to a 16-year-old girl who is spotted at the mall and told that she’s pretty enough to be a model. It could happen to a middle-aged Vietnamese woman seeking citizenship and looking for a job at a nail salon or massage parlor. It could happen to a male, young or old – and statistics show that almost half of human trafficking victims are in fact men and boys."

data.description: Editor’s Note: This is the first in a four-part series on human trafficking, an overview of what it is. Future stories will include interviews with law enforcement, clergy and parents and …
data.title: Human trafficking
